BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-code>ValueError: all the input array dimensions for the concatenation axis must match exactly
 </denchmark-code>
 
 see <denchmark-link:https://github.com/williamfzc/work_with_stagesepx/issues/8#issuecomment-669769595>williamfzc/work_with_stagesepx#8 (comment)</denchmark-link>

comments_0.comment_text:
This problem will happen when merging frames which have different sizes.
 It should be fixed by sending a specific target_size like this:
 r = Reporter()
 r.draw(
     classify_result,
     report_path=os.path.join(data_home, "report.html"),
     cut_result=res,
     target_size=(600, 800),
 )
